command.exception.points_must_ascending_: Points must be added in ascending order
command.exception.start_point_first: You must add start point first
command.exception.only_one_start_point: You can add only one start point
command.feedback.timer_will_start: Timer will start, when you type '/brm race go <CountDownTime>'
